data.title: Horses, jockeys and trainers for the 2021 Durbanjuly
data.meta_description: 2021 Durban July Winners. Kommetdieding wins. Final field of Horses and Jockeys for the 2021 Vodacom Durban July at GreyVille Saturday 3rd July 2021
data.text:
Durban July 2021 Entrants

updated -28 June 2021

Important Vodacom Durban July dates to diarise:

The Vodacom Durban July gallops will take place at Greyville Racecourse about, 10 days before the big event. The gallops, which are now a condition of entry for the countryâ€™s greatest horse race, provide the racing public a final chance to see all the runners in action.
